typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EnqueuedTimeUtc as string,
		Properties as ({} as string),
		SystemProperties as (connectionDeviceId as string, connectionAuthMethod as string, connectionDeviceGenerationId as string, contentType as string, interfaceName as string, enqueuedTime as string),
		Body as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:['*/*/*/*/*']) ~> iotcentralblob
iotcentralblob derive(BodyString = fromBase64(Body)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 foldDown(mapColumn(
		EnqueuedTimeUtc,
		Properties,
		SystemProperties,
		Body,
		BodyString
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
